overview:
CEO and Founder of ground breaking online organizer Scrybe (www.iscrybe.com ), known for its enterprising use of web technologies and user experience. The unique ‘viral’ video used for Scrybeâ€™s beta launch has almost 500,000 views on YouTube and upon its launch, created enough of a buzz for the likes of Adobe, NYTimes, Washington Post, CNET, Wired, and Gartner etc. to take note. Scrybe is funded by a major US technology giant, Adobe.

Faizan’s passion for User Experience, design and solving tough engineering problems, is resulting in yet another product from Scrybe: www.convofy.com.

Faizan has almost 10 years of Product Management experience in Enterprise class products. He holds a Bachelor’s in Electronics Engineering.

milestones.source_description: First look at future of work: Yammer and Salesforce Chatter have new competition: Convofy
